nodes.text: The Spice Blades were a small, elite force of Sevari serving under Spice Lord Cassius Nolath Rha. They were specially trained in vibroblade and flashrifle combat, and had a tendency to shoot first and ask later. They wore black and blood-red tunics, trousers and boots as well as distinctive respirators pumping humidified black spice into their lungs, making them totally loyal to their master.
